data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hämäläinen, Matti (2014): Atrocalopteryx auco spec. nov. from Vietnam, with taxonomic notes on its congeners (Odonata: Calopterygidae). Zootaxa 3793 (5): 561-572, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3793.5.4
